name: Somnium (Devillia59)
description:
Explore a dream world full of mystery...

Maintain your mental health...

Beware the dark beings...

Beware the Abyss... 

You find yourself trapped in a dream world and must find a way out. Encounter your past memories and heal beings as you explore your surroundings to find a way out and wake up.  

Created for an academic project with the core theme of mental health, to raise awareness drawing on my own personal experiences. 

Dev blog:  https://clairegoh.wixsite.com/flowrider/somnium

Controls:

  • A = Move Left
  • D = Move Right
  • W = Move Forward
  • S = Move Backward
  • Space Bar = Jump
  • LMB = Throw heart
  • E = Pick Up / Interact / Use
  • ESC = Pause / Quit

Credits:

  • Design, Art, Programming - Claire Langton - Goh (Devillia59)

Feedback welcome!

Enjoy the game!
